result.reason: An internal error during connection import indicates a defect in the deserialization or processing logic of imported connection data, requiring investigation and a fix.
result.approach: Investigate the XmlConnectionsDeserializer and MRemoteNGXmlImporter classes to identify the source of the internal error during connection import and implement a robust fix, potentially adding error handling or validation.
